channel.title: ** Need Help With Playing A Client - Java Unreconized? **
channel.description:
Hey all.
I have just downloaded a sever to play on, and when I open it to play (run), it says:
'java' is not reconized as an internal or external command, operatable program or batch file.
How can I fix this so I can play? Need help ASAP.
Thanks - Ags4Lyfe

item.title: ** Need Help With Playing A Client - Java Unreconized? **
item.dc:creator: @Ags4Lyfe Ags4Lyfe
item.description:
@Ags4Lyfe wrote:

OK great thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2009, 08:28:59 am[/size][hr]Hey it works now! Thanks sooo much!!

Read full topic

item.title: ** Need Help With Playing A Client - Java Unreconized? **
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html
Read it and you should not have any problems.

You need to either change the batch file or your environment variables.
